title: Born of Desire and Blood
description: His thirst for vengeance. Her desire for his touch. Their chase through eternity.“Kenzi” Katherine MacKenzie is being hunted by Duncan Munroe. For four hundred years he has searched for her, their immortal baobhan sith bodies immune to age, her crime against him driving his thirst for vengeance. His need to be free of the sith curse.But what he discovers when he captures her—what they both discover in each other—upends their centuries-long chase into something far greater. Something frightening.Something eternal.
author: Corey Harper
